name: test_e2e_with_logs[016_SQLI_BYPASS_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_002` |
| **Name** | Comment-based keyword WAF bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'/**/UNION/**/SELECT/**/version(),NULL,NULL--`
- **Encoded**: `'%2F**%2FUNION%2F**%2FSELECT%2F**%2Fversion()%2CNULL%2CNULL--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~34000ms
- **Timestamp**: 01:33:20.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence
